name: Fantastic Farm
summary:
Help the fresh out of school Maggie run her magical farm! Use a variety of magic powers to grow a small farm into a prosperous enterprise! Care for the animals, grow plants and make enchanted goods in Fantastic Farm! Earn trophy achievements and keep the sinister business man from shutting your farm down. Make ice creams, sweaters, strawberry pies and lots more in this fun and exciting Time Management game!

Multiple magical spells
Different animals to care for
Run a Fantastic Farm!
